summary:
Hello!

My Name is Santiago Alonso and I am writing to apply for this works positions  

I am able to speak Spanish, English , Portuguese and a little bit of german as I had been living and working in Lisbon Portugal and Viena,Austria for international companies for three  and two years. Originally I studied tourism as well as social pedagogy in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Having more than ten years of work experience within these fields, I have developed strong expertise in project management and networking as well as socio-human interrelationships and communication. 

 

I consider myself as an open minded, cosmopolitan and responsible person who likes to get in touch with people and cultures from all over the world – something I was able to put into practice while working in three different hotels in Buenos Aires. For additional information on my experience and competences please see my CV, which you can find attached to this mail.

 


Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any further questions, I will be more than willing to answer them. Thank you for your time and consideration. I would highly appreciate the opportunity to meet you and discuss employment possibilities.




Sincerely,

Santiago Alonso
